news_header: Electricity prices peak on Friday at 18:00, reaching over 37 cents per kilowatt-hour due to low wind power production. Prices are high in the morning as well, with a rise to nearly 34 cents at 8:00.
news_original_title: Saunaa ei kannata lämmittää perjantaina alkuillasta – sähkö on huomenna kallista
news_text: The low wind speed of 2-3 meters per second contributes to the situation, with wind power output at only 300 megawatts compared to a potential of over 8,000 megawatts. Increased electricity consumption is also noted due to freezing temperatures. Wind power production is expected to rise again on Saturday.
